reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing yoni soap
reviews.reviewText: I recently received this and I must say the smell of 🍍 is amazing. I stay fresh all day. My skin is extremely sensitive, so this soap was great. No breakouts or unsightly vaginal discharge or smells. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells like pineapple
reviews.reviewText: I like this soap, it smells nice. It lathers like crazy. Seems to do a good job cleaning my body. I ordered it without realizing that it's supposed to be for problems with yeast and vjj "tightening" but I can't comment on that because I will not be using it in that way or for that purpose. It claims to be moisturizing but I'm not sure if I would even go that far. I would just say as a soap it's nice. I appreciate the mesh bag to hang it in my shower to dry in between uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softly scented and great for sensitive areas
reviews.reviewText: I am not really a soap kind of gal but I am pleasantly surprised by this ph balanced soap. Although, it is marketed for a woman's intimate areas this soap is great all over the body.I like the pineapple/ tropical scent. It doesn't linger after my shower, which I actually like as I do not care for over-powering scents if I take a shower before bed.The soap comes with a net that helps create a sudsy lather. It works really well and doubles as a holder for the soap when not in use. (I hang it on the hook with my loofah.) The soap does lather quite well without the net.This soap never dries out my skin and it leaves no residue behind. I live in Minnesota and having something that doesn't dry my skin out in the winter is a must. My skin feels always feels squeaky clean after using it.I have used it on my lady bits and it doesn't irritate my sensitive areas. I am actually sensitive to pineapple when I eat it. (My tongue bleeds.) I didn't have any sensitivity to this soap.I am impressed with this product and I will be reordering it when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice silky soap
reviews.reviewText: What to say about this as a woman who is in menopause. I have had a good laugh telling my daughters about this soap. They look at me like I am crazy, but I really do like it. You put it in the bag and hang it in the shower. When you use you just get the bag wet and lather it up onto your hands, hang the bag back and wash using the suds on your hands. It is a very silky feeling, and I haven't been irritated by it at all. I would recommend it to any women that might be looking for a feminine soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: This was a waste of a purchase. This bar is basically all over body soap. I feel cleaner using doves beauty bar honestly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so yummy!!!
reviews.reviewText: Ohh wow this is seriously the best smelling soap I've ever had!!! That is seriously saying a lot too I am what some may call a condesuor of all things smelly good!! Lol!!! I love to pamper!!! Especially myself!!! The bag that this comes with to lather up with and keep clean is a silver spun in the lining of the mesh so it's so incredible!!! It stays cleaner then anything else in your shower even with the dampness!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, good soap, not sure why it's advertised as for the nether parts.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice-smelling pineapple scented soap that lathers nicely and comes with a nice mesh bag for storage or to use as a shower scrub. I love the scent and the feel of the soap, but for some reason it's advertised as soap for the female nether parts -- and there's no real reason to segregate it like that.It's a gentle soap, so you could certainly use it "down there" as easily as you could use it on your face or anywhere, really. The scent is light and leaves only a trace of scent on the skin. I have pretty sensitive skin and didn't notice any issues when using it.I would recommend this soap to anyone, for any body part, if you like a tropical scent or enjoy a pineapple smell to your shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: It has a great mild scent and it lathers up great. It came with a mesh bag which makes it easy to hang from the shower caddy and keeps it from laying flat and turning to mush. You can easily lather up from that hanging position and get plenty of suds to apply to its intended target areas. It feels moisturizing and is great from front to back. I’m not much for all kinds of specialized skin care products, i like to keep it clean but simple but this is definitely a product zi will buy again
